title: Recording system
body:
When i recorded the game, i only got the audio, not the video.Can someone help me fix that?
I get icon like this http://prntscr.com/dkzyfg
It's windows media player folder

replies.body: Thanks, appreciate it.Now i don't need recording programs to record gameplay :D

Have you tried opening the Highlight using something like [**VLC Player**](http://www.videolan.org/) or Google Chrome instead? Some Windows applications have a harder time playing these files than others.
